text: @Forbes @abebrown716 Jack Dorsey has donated more to coronavirus efforts than Jeff Bezos, Mark Zuckerberg, and Bill Gates combined. Those three men are all much richer than Dorsey. Dorsey donated about 28% of his wealth. Nothing but the utmost respect for this man.
